GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4.209 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix l2cap_global_chan_by_psm regression

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit 13e17a18a46bb9e3a447d4da77d0311e627761c9, it was introduced in version v5.4.209 by commit 098e07ef0059296e710a801cdbd74b59016e6624. For more details please see the references link.
